title: Error message when i create a custom game or ranked search
body: dosent prevent me from playing or anything just really annoying bug lots of people i know have it as well.

replies.body: been happening to me like 5 hours ago but i seem too fix it by repairing my client

Hey there,

What error are you receiving?

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
